title: Bandit E-sports Recruiting
body:
Hey guys,

I am one of the few leaders behind Bandit E-sports. We are a newer E-sports organisation with only around 1.5k followers on twitters. Despite this, we are on the prowl for new and upcoming talent to play under our Bandit brand. We have a few sponsors under our belt and an overseas investor that helps with the whole funding process. 

Now, enough about us and more about YOU! We are currently looking for a diamond or higher (average rank) team who is willing to grind out this upcoming competitive season. All participants ages must be 18+, possess the ability to communicate with us clearly and on a daily basis. The more you put into this, the more you'll see as a return. 

Simply reply to thread or DM our twitter (see link below) for more details.

Thank you all, #StayLawless

Twitter:https://twitter.com/BanditESC

Would love to know more about this

Hi, I'm an ADC player who is interested in joining. 

I have 2 accounts, my main one (named Plutó), currently D5, and my smurf account (named PIuto (i instead of an L)) which is Master. 

I've added you on the League client as well, so we can discuss further over there.
I am a Support/Jungle player who finished season 7 in diamond 4, would love to talk more about the opportunity :)

Well, i fit all the criteria so i'll leave a message to find out more details and i'll also put my league ign here just in case ^.^
  IGN: KystaTheKing
Hey my man, I added you recently on the client so if you want, shoot me a message on there when you're on and we can chat more about it on there. These comments threads are just a little bit shaky
It hasn't popped up on my client so i just added your account instead hopefully that worked
Your IGN is your name that you post with :P

Hi, I finished P3 last season as a support main (ADC 2nd role). 
I know the cut off was D5 but I am happy to be a sub, I am just keen to improve my game.

IGN: FydarLight

Im not quite diamond but I have a lot of hours on the game and am looking to improve inside a team environment, I would very much like to join the scene of competitive and would basically play all day and night to get there...

IGN: Julez
Hey my man, great to hear! I added you via the client, just send me a mesage when you're on next and I'll get back with more details! Thanks
Hey, I fit the criteria and I'm interesting in joining the competitive scene. IGN: Ikiea
Heyy, added you through the client my dude, just shoot me a message when you're on next and I'll get back to you with more details and all that jazz!
